comment.author: 47081078@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called World Waterfall Database, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 38130731@N03
comment._content: What a cool waterfall!  I'm curious to see what over 100 years of water erosion has done. Hopefully this natural beauty hasn't fallen victim to those industrial power plants!

comment.author: 34405198@N02
comment._content: If you are searching for this waterfall in Hardanger, you will search in vain. The waterfall with no hotel today, is situated on the route between Voss and Sognefjord at Gudvangen.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks to all for your help!  The description is updated. -- Helena (LOC)
